title: Disappointed
body:
So the Automatic "LeaverBuster" is busting everyone's brains out because sometimes they're out into lower queue because of a crash or a server disconnecting. BS.
This happened to my friend Woonjoom and I, when we were playing in a normal match, (Ping 131), and then we both disconnected due to internet problems. About a minute later from the internet problem, we reconnected to the game, but the server says the game was already over, and we were "Free to play another one." But once I was in the lobby, It says something about 'Leaverbusting" or "AFK" or "You're put into a lower queue for 5 matchmade games." We didn't do anything, but the game just crashed. So much for normal games!

replies.body:
Ok.
That's what happens when you're disconnected for whatever reason and someone reports you. It seems to happen enough that you got leaver buster so maybe you need to check your internet.
